T11bsa072_u:0: Tarkabhāṣā pratyakṣam maṅgalācaraṇam guruṃ praṇamya lokeśaṃ śiśunāmalpamedhasām /
T11bsa072_u:2: pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇam iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo 'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpādyate /
T11bsa072_u:13: tasmādutpannaṃ tadarthaprāpaṇayogyaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam // pramāṇasya kāryam
T11bsa072_u:14: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt? ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:15: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:16: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarūpaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:18: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām, artho vā yogipiśācādibhirapahriyatām
T11bsa072_u:19: jñānasya kimāyātam? // kṣaṇikaṃ sannapi pramāṇasya saṃgatiḥ
T11bsa072_u:22: na ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatprāpyate, kṣaṇikatvāt kiṃ ca,
T11bsa072_u:24: tato 'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām /
T11bsa072_u:25: na, yadi nāma vastuto 'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:27: arthakriyāsthitiḥ nanvidaṃ prāpaṇayogyamidaṃ netyarthakriyā prāptimantareṇa niścetumaśakyam
T11bsa072_u:29: tataśca kathaṃ tatsamyagjñānamiti cet? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:30: yaddyapi jñānamātrodayād vaiśiṣṭyamanayoravadhārayituṃ na śakyate, tathāpi jñānaviśeṣodayāddyathaikasya vaiśiṣṭayaṃ tathocyate /
T11bsa072_u:31: tathā hi - yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ
T11bsa072_u:35: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet? na /
T11bsa072_u:46: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti /
T11bsa072_u:48: sthitametat- āsāditanirantarārthakriyāvyavahārāt paṭutarapratyakṣodayādevārtha pravartate, mandabuddhistu tādrūpyānumānāditi /
T11bsa072_u:49: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:51: yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:52: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam /
T11bsa072_u:54: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva
T11bsa072_u:55: pramāṇam, na tu tatraiva paścādbhāvi jñānāntaramapi, gṛhitagrāhitvena tasyāprāmāṇyāt /
T11bsa072_u:56: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo 'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarūpam,
T11bsa072_u:57: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam
T11bsa072_u:58: indriyādera apramāṇam samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam /
T11bsa072_u:66: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ pratyakṣaṃ na syāt?
T11bsa072_u:69: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarūpamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti //
T11bsa072_u:73: liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:75: pramāṇasaṃkhyāvipratipattiḥ dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante /
T11bsa072_u:81: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham
T11bsa072_u:82: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam //
T11bsa072_u:84: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati /
T11bsa072_u:90: svayamevānumānena pramāṇena vyavaharati, nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ
T11bsa072_u:91: śabdopamānārthāpatyabhāvānāṃ pramāṇāntaratvanirasanam śābdaṃ ca jñānaṃ bāhyārthāvisaṃvādakatvena pramāṇameṣṭavyam /
T11bsa072_u:93: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho 'sti /
T11bsa072_u:94: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet /
T11bsa072_u:102: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate
T11bsa072_u:104: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho 'sti /
T11bsa072_u:105: evaṃ tarhyasaṃketavido 'pi puruṣasya śabdāduccaritānniyatārthapratītiḥ prāptā, yogyatā mātreṇaiva
T11bsa072_u:109: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate /
T11bsa072_u:113: tato na jñāyate kiṃ vivakṣitārthamāha, āhosvidanyaṃ veti /
T11bsa072_u:115: tathā ca so 'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ
T11bsa072_u:118: 'pi teṣu kena sambandhena sambaddhaḥ? pañcamena kenaciccet, so 'pi
T11bsa072_u:120: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet /
T11bsa072_u:122: yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:123: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ, yena sambandhāntaranirapekṣa evaṃ paraṃ
T11bsa072_u:126: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ /
T11bsa072_u:127: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:128: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti /
T11bsa072_u:129: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ
T11bsa072_u:130: vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti, tatkathaṃ saṃketāntaramapekṣya puruṣecchayā turagādikamabhidadhyāt
T11bsa072_u:131: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt /
T11bsa072_u:139: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti /
T11bsa072_u:140: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam /
T11bsa072_u:143: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:146: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam, sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti
T11bsa072_u:147: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān,
T11bsa072_u:149: sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti /
T11bsa072_u:150: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ phalasvarūpāṃ janayatpramāṇam /
T11bsa072_u:153: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:154: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:160: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam /
T11bsa072_u:166: yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati //
T11bsa072_u:167: mīmāṃsakasammatasyopamānapramāṇasya nirasanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakopavarṇitasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ nirākartavyam
T11bsa072_u:169: sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:170: na ca sadṛśavastuno 'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate, pramāṇenāpratītatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:171: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā
T11bsa072_u:173: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsiddhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:174: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā /
T11bsa072_u:176: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikalddhapyate /
T11bsa072_u:179: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam
T11bsa072_u:181: pramāṇadṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ, tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo va pratibandho 'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vāsau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva atha nāsti pratibandhaḥ, tadānīmarthāpattiḥ pramāṇameva na bhavati,
T11bsa072_u:183: abhāvapramāṇanirasanam abhāvasya svarūpameva tāvannopalabhāmahe, kuta eva tasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T11bsa072_u:186: / tatra keyamanutpattiḥ? kiṃ prasajyavṛtyā pramāṇānutpattimātram? atha paryudāsavṛtyā vastvantaram? vastvantaramapi jaḍarūpaṃ, jñānarūpaṃ vā?
T11bsa072_u:187: jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā? tatra na tāvat prasajyarūpo 'bhāvo yujyate /
T11bsa072_u:188: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet? ata eva kenāpi na tatpratidyate
T11bsa072_u:192: na hi jaḍarūpaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti /
T11bsa072_u:204: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta, vikalpakāryādiṣṭāpādānaparihārāt
T11bsa072_u:207: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa072_u:208: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta? na /
T11bsa072_u:209: arthasvarūpasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham /
T11bsa072_u:214: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
T11bsa072_u:216: kalpanājñānamarthamantareṇa vāsanāmātrādevopajāyamānaṃ kathamarthasya kāryaṃ syāt, arthena saha anvayavyatirekābhāvāt /
T11bsa072_u:217: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam, atiprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa072_u:218: yadi punaḥ kalpanājñānamarthādupajāyeta, tenāpi tadā ghaṭādirartho dṛśyeta /
T11bsa072_u:221: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti //
T11bsa072_u:222: etena yaduktaṃ pareṇaḥ na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
T11bsa072_u:223: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarva śabdena bhāsate // iti //
T11bsa072_u:225: tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva /
T11bsa072_u:231: deśakālākāraniyataṃ, tatkathaṃ viparītapratibhāsinā bhrāntena jñānena sākṣātkriyate /
T11bsa072_u:235: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ, bhramādalātādau cakrādinirbhāsi jñānaṃ, gacchantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya
T11bsa072_u:236: caladavṛkṣādibhrāntijñānaṃ, gāḍhamarmaprahārahatasya jvalatstambhādipratibhāsi jñānaṃ ca, na pratyakṣamityuktaṃ bhavati /
T11bsa072_u:237: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet? na tato vastuprāptiḥ
T11bsa072_u:240: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti /
T11bsa072_u:249: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurūpaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam, sāṃvyāvahārika pramāṇādhikārāditi //
T11bsa072_u:251: svaśabdenendriyajñānamabhimatam, svasya viṣayo bāhyo ghaṭādiḥ, svaviṣayasyānantaraḥ, svaviṣayānantaraḥ indriyajñānaviṣayādanyo ghaṭādirdvitīyakṣaṇaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:260: andhādīnāṃ rūpādiviṣayālambanakamindriyajñānameva nāsti, kutastajjanitaṃ mānasaṃ bhaviṣyati? ato nāstyandhabadhirādyabhāvadoṣaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:270: `dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo rūpaṃ gṛhyate, cakṣuṣā tadākṛṣṭenamanasā ca' iti //
T11bsa072_u:271: nanu ca vyavahārānupayuktamupadarśayituṃ kiṃ prayojanam, īdṛglakṣaṇayuktaṃ yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt, na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi
T11bsa072_u:275: citte bhāvāḥ caittāḥ, vastuno viśeṣarūpagrāhakā sukhaduḥkhopakṣālakṣaṇāḥ /
T11bsa072_u:276: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rūpeṇa tatsvarūpamātmasvarūpasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate /
T11bsa072_u:277: atra kecidāhuḥ - na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
T11bsa072_u:278: na ca suśikṣito 'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti /
T11bsa072_u:282: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:283: karmakartṛtvaṃ ca loke bhedenaiva prasiddham, vṛkṣasūtradhārayoriva /
T11bsa072_u:284: atrocyate, na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate /
T11bsa072_u:287: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
T11bsa072_u:294: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate /
T11bsa072_u:295: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
T11bsa072_u:299: api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt, tadā jñāto 'rtho iti durghaṭaḥ syāt,
T11bsa072_u:302: viśeṣyaḥ, jñāta iti viśeṣaṇam, jñāto jñānena viśeṣita iti /
T11bsa072_u:303: jñānaṃ cetsvayaṃ na bodharūpeṇa pratītaṃ, tatkathaṃ jñānena viśeṣito 'rthaḥ
T11bsa072_u:305: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam /
T11bsa072_u:307: cakṣuṣo 'grahaṇe 'pi cākṣuṣaṃ rūpaṃ pratīyate, tathā jñānānavabodhe 'pi jñāto 'rtha iti ghaṭiṣyate // iti //
T11bsa072_u:314: yathā ca rūpādiprakāśanyathānupapatyā indriyasiddhiḥ, tathā jñānasyāpi siddhiriti /
T11bsa072_u:323: prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarūpatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarūpatā, jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt /
T11bsa072_u:332: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:333: parokṣasya svarūpaṃ kastasya lakṣayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
T11bsa072_u:336: pītaśaṅkhādijñānasyābhrāntatvaṃ ca kathaṃ na bhavet? ucyate -
T11bsa072_u:347: tasmādanyathā prakāśāsiddheḥ yadyamī prakāśante, tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam //
T11bsa072_u:363: nanu bhāvanā vikalpaḥ, vikalpaścāvastuviṣayaḥ, tatkathaṃ vastunaḥ sphuṭībhāvo bhavatu /kathaṃ vā vikalpo nirvikalpatāṃ vrajet? kṣaṇikaṃ ca citaṃ kathamekāgrībhavati? viśeṣaśca kasya kena vā kriyatām? śarīrī ca rāgādivirahānmuktaśceti sarvamasaṃgatam /
T11bsa072_u:365: vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:366: na ca vikalpa eva nirvikalpakaḥ, kiṃ tu vikalpānnirvikalpakasyodayaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:370: kṣaṇikatvanaiva viśeṣotpattiḥ, na tu nityatvena, nityasyānādheyātiśayatvāt yaduktam -
T11bsa072_u:371: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati /

T11bsa072_u:691: tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī /
T11bsa072_u:692: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo 'yam /
T11bsa072_u:693: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum /
T11bsa072_u:694: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavatprayoganirūpaṇam svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadānantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararūpaṃ, yathākāśam /
T11bsa072_u:696: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti boddhavyam /
T11bsa072_u:697: tathāparo 'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti, yathā gaganāravinde /
T11bsa072_u:699: tathā yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapi, yathā kūrmaromṇi /
T11bsa072_u:701: yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatra kṛtakamapi, yathā śaśaśriṅge /
T11bsa072_u:703: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti, yathā gagane /
T11bsa072_u:705: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavadvaidharmyavatprayoganirūpaṇam kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
T11bsa072_u:707: kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ
T11bsa072_u:708: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade
T11bsa072_u:710: anupalabdhessādharmyavad prayogaḥ anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo 'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā
T11bsa072_u:714: vaidharmyavatprayoganirūpaṇam anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva, yathā nīlādiviśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:716: sādhyasādhanayorvyāptiḥ sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam /
T11bsa072_u:717: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam
T11bsa072_u:718: sādhanasya ca sādhye niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:719: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta, sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi /
T11bsa072_u:720: parāṅgīkṛteśvarasādhakānumānasya nirasanam yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na siddhā, tatra śaṅkāprasaro 'nivāryaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:723: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt, īśvaraḥ punassarvajñaḥ śakyate sādhayitum /
T11bsa072_u:724: tathā hi, loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ
T11bsa072_u:730: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā buddhimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt,
T11bsa072_u:737: tadyadi buddhimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ buddhimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta /
T11bsa072_u:739: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na buddhimaddhetukamiti /
T11bsa072_u:741: sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam /
T11bsa072_u:742: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:744: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
T11bsa072_u:746: athāśakyārohaṇe 'pi parvate dahanamantareṇa ca dhūmadarśanāt, evaṃ dhūme 'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna /
T11bsa072_u:747: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam /
T11bsa072_u:748: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena buddhimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam /
T11bsa072_u:749: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa buddhimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya buddhimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
T11bsa072_u:750: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] siddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:755: trilocanābhyupagatasya vahnidhūmayoḥ svābhāvavika sambandhavādasya nirasanam yacca trilocanenoktam-
T11bsa072_u:756: `yathā svābhāvikaḥ sambandho dhūmādīnāṃ vahnayādibhissaha tathā kāryatvasya buddhimatā sārdham, tadupādheranupalabhyamānatvāt,
T11bsa072_u:762: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:769: na ca caivaṃ saṃśayena sarvatrapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, pramāṇādarthasandehācca pravṛtterupapatteḥ
T11bsa072_u:772: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ, na sarva, tathā mamāpyanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambaddhaṃ na sarvam' iti /
T11bsa072_u:774: yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasiddhiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho 'pi pramāṇasiddhaḥ, yenaivamucyate? kiñca svābhāvikasambandha iti ko 'rthaḥ? kiṃ svato bhūtaḥ, svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ /
T11bsa072_u:775: tatra na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
T11bsa072_u:778: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:786: ākāśe hi yathā buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva /
T11bsa072_u:787: tatkasyābhāvaprayuktakāryatvābhāvaḥ pratīyatāṃ, yena sādhyābhāvaprayuktasādhanābhāva vyatirekaḥ sidhyatīti /
T11bsa072_u:788: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate, yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā
T11bsa072_u:792: tathā hi, vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate /
T11bsa072_u:793: pramāṇaṃ ca prameyasya kāryam, 'nākāraṇaṃ viṣaya' iti nyāyāt /
T11bsa072_u:796: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt, tadā yuktamevaitat /
T11bsa072_u:803: `viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam' iti /
T11bsa072_u:806: tathā hi - [kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam /
T11bsa072_u:810: ato yadanenoktam - 'nāyaṃ hetudoṣaḥ, ato na parihartavyaḥ, tasya copanyāso 'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam' iti /
T11bsa072_u:811: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ //
T11bsa072_u:812: īśvarasādhakānumāne anupapattiḥ nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt,
T11bsa072_u:816: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabuddhimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate, yenāsyāpi dṛśyatā syāt /
T11bsa072_u:817: tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ // kiñca yadi buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvamanena sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhanatādūṣaṇaṃ sādhanasya /
T11bsa072_u:818: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate, tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi
T11bsa072_u:820: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt siddhirucyate? tanna yuktam /
T11bsa072_u:821: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate, tasya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmabalādyuktā siddhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:822: yathā dhūmāt parvatadeśavṛttitvasya dahanadharmasya, na tu tārṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣāṇām /
T11bsa072_u:832: atha śakramūrdhno 'pīśvarapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyaṃ, tarhi ghaṭasyāpīśvarapūrvakatvasiddhau kuto
T11bsa072_u:833: dṛṣṭāntatvam? atha kumbhakārasya kartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kathamapākriyate?
T11bsa072_u:834: kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate? nāpi bahūnāṃ kāraṇatve vipratipattisambhāvanā, dṛṣṭatvādeveti /
T11bsa072_u:835: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam /
T11bsa072_u:841: sādharmyavaidharmyaprayogeṣu trairūpyāsiddhyāśaṃṅkā tannirasanañca nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:842: vaidharmyavati ca vyatireka evoktaḥ, na tvanvayaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:843: tatkathamābhyāṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet, naiṣa doṣaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:846: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve 'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:849: tathā vaidharmyavati sādhanavākye upanyaste sāmarthyādevānvayo 'vagamyate, anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ
T11bsa072_u:851: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet /
T11bsa072_u:854: vyaptigrāhaka pramāṇanirūpaṇam samprati sādhyasādhanayorvyāptiḥ yatra dharmiṇi grahītavyā,yena
T11bsa072_u:855: pramāṇena, tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit
T11bsa072_u:859: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā
T11bsa072_u:863: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasiddhervikalpasiddhervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi, kāryahetordhūmādervahnyādinā mahānasādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi trividhapratyakṣānupalambhataḥ,
T11bsa072_u:865: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva /
T11bsa072_u:866: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit, yathāsvabhāvaṃ pramāṇenonnīya grahītavyeti //
T11bsa072_u:873: ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:874: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano 'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:875: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:878: sādhāraṇanaikāntiko yathā - nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt, ghaṭavat ākāśavat /
T11bsa072_u:881: yaduktaṃ prāk, sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti, tatra ko 'yaṃ prasaṅgo nāma?
T11bsa072_u:884: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālapham /
T11bsa072_u:887: prasaṅgasya kāryam athānekatvaṃ neṣyate, tadānekavṛttitvaṃ ca mā svīkurvīthāḥ /
T11bsa072_u:888: nanu yadyetat prasaṅgākhyaṃ sādhanaṃ pramāṇa, na bhavati [trairūpyābhāvāt]
T11bsa072_u:893: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām
T11bsa072_u:895: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:903: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asiddha ucyate /
T11bsa072_u:907: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarūpādanyat /
T11bsa072_u:911: ātmanirasanam yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsiddhirhetordūṣaṇam /
T11bsa072_u:913: tadiha bauddhasyātmaiva na siddhaḥ, kiṃ punasasya sarvadeśopalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ setsyati /
T11bsa072_u:916: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
T11bsa072_u:922: gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ -
T11bsa072_u:925: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā /
T11bsa072_u:926: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī /
T11bsa072_u:927: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ, skhaladvṛttiprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa072_u:933: tasya ca sarvathāsiddheḥ, kathaṃ tena vyāptatvaṃ liṅgasya niścīyatām? kiñca,
T11bsa072_u:934: kiyamātmā bodharūpaḥ, abodharūpo vā? yadi bodharūpo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaiphalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ /
T11bsa072_u:935: athānityo bodharūpastadājñānasyaivātmeti nāma kṛtam, na vipratipattiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:936: athābodharūpo dṛśyaśca tadānupalambho 'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasiddhiranavadyā /
T11bsa072_u:942: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā /
T11bsa072_u:945: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati //
T11bsa072_u:947: nanu sāmānyaṃ cedaprasiddhaṃ, tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:948: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ
T11bsa072_u:950: nanu ko 'yamapoho nāma? yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate, apohyate 'smādanyadvijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
T11bsa072_u:951: yathāpratibhāsaṃ buddhyākāro vāpohaḥ, apohyate pṛthak kriyate 'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
T11bsa072_u:954: nanu yathādhyavasāyaṃ vidhireva, tarhi kevalo visāya ityāgatam /
T11bsa072_u:956: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam
T11bsa072_u:957: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho 'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam /
T11bsa072_u:958: tanna yuktam, vyavahārakāle prathamaṃ vartamānasyāpi pratītikramādarśanāt /
T11bsa072_u:959: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati, apohaṃ vā pratipadya
T11bsa072_u:965: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva
T11bsa072_u:967: yathā ca pratyakṣasya prasajyapratiṣedharūpābhāvagrahaṇamabhāva vikalpotpādanaśaktireva, tathā vidhivikalpānāmapi tadanurūpānuṣṭhānaśaktirevābhāvagrahaṇamabhidhīyate /
T11bsa072_u:968: anyathā yadi gośabdādarthapratipattikāle nāvagataḥ parāpohaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām /
T11bsa072_u:976: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:981: tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam //
T11bsa072_u:983: kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate, tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
T11bsa072_u:986: gṛhīte svarūpe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti //
T11bsa072_u:987: paraparikalpitasāmānyanirasanam yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate, anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe /
T11bsa072_u:989: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate /
T11bsa072_u:995: jananāya samarthāḥ, na sarvāḥ, ityatra kāryakāraṇabhāvasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ dṛṣṭasyātivartayitumaśakyatvāt
T11bsa072_u:996: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām /
T11bsa072_u:1000: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi
T11bsa072_u:1001: govyaktiṣveva samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ parasya /
T11bsa072_u:1013: viśiṣṭabuddhitvaṃ ca sāmānyamityanaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt,bhinnaviśeṣaṇagrahaṇamantareṇāpi tasya darśanāt /
T11bsa072_u:1015: dvitīyapakṣe tu siddhasādhanam, svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti
T11bsa072_u:1020: tadevaṃ paraparikalpitasāmānyasya vicārāsahatvāt, atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātrameva sāmānyamapohaśabdavācyaṃ vyavahārāṅgaṃ yathādhyavasāyamanavadyamiti sthitam /
T11bsa072_u:1023: asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ,yathā turaṅgamottamāṃge śṛṅgaṃ, nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1025: varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rūpasya nipuṇamapi nirūpyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt, nāpi jñānavaddarśanābhāve 'pi
T11bsa072_u:1027: jñānaṃ hi svasaṃvedanapramāṇasiddham, na tu cakṣurvijñānagrāhyam /
T11bsa072_u:1033: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam //
T11bsa072_u:1035: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
T11bsa072_u:1036: tatra na tāvannityo yuktaḥ, nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
T11bsa072_u:1037: yena hi svarūpeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarūpaṃ sargakāle 'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau
T11bsa072_u:1040: na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1045: buddhimāṃstu karttumīśāno 'pi anicchanna karotīti kastasyopālambhaḥ? ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1046: atha svarūpeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1047: yatsahakārilakṣaṇayāgantukaśaktyā vinā na karotīti cet, tarhi mātāpi sati
T11bsa072_u:1048: vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat //
T11bsa072_u:1049: nanveṣa eva kāryasvabhāvaḥ, kevalāt samarthādapi nodeti,
T11bsa072_u:1051: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt /
T11bsa072_u:1054: nityasya kramakāritvaniṣedhanam nāpi nityaḥ krameṇa kāryakārīti yuktam, nirapekṣatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1058: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam /
T11bsa072_u:1065: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam /
T11bsa072_u:1068: na ca prāgavasthamadhunā sākṣātkartavyam, api tu smartavyam /
T11bsa072_u:1070: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt, tatsākṣātkaraṇapravaṇaṃ kathamidaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma? yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ -
T11bsa072_u:1073: smaraṇagrahaṇasvarūpaṃ tarhi pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt, na tu grahaṇasvarūpameva /
T11bsa072_u:1076: yena hi svarūpeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarūpeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum /
T11bsa072_u:1082: prayogaścaivam - yaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sa tattvato naikālambanaḥ,
T11bsa072_u:1084: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1085: ekatvānekatvayoḥ parasparavirodhāt tadviṣayakasaṃvedanayorapi virodhaḥ tenaikālambanatvena anekālambanatvaviruddhena anekālambanatvena pūrvoktyā nītyā pratyabhijñāpratyayo vyāpta iti na pratyabhijñānaṃ kṣaṇikānumānabādhakam /
T11bsa072_u:1086: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt
T11bsa072_u:1091: na ca pratyabhijñānameva tadavasthāpakam, yasyaiva vicāryamāṇatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1093: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ,
T11bsa072_u:1095: sattvānāṃ śubhakarmaṇaḥ jagataḥ kāraṇatvasamarthanam sattvānāṃ śubhāśubhākhyaṃ karma /
T11bsa072_u:1098: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti // iti //
T11bsa072_u:1102: sarvajñasamarthanam bhavaparamparāsamarthanaṃ ca nanu sarvajñasiddhau hi tadvacanaṃ nidarśanīkartumucitam
T11bsa072_u:1108: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt
T11bsa072_u:1109: na caiṣa viruddhaḥ, sapakṣe kāminyākāre sambhavāt /
T11bsa072_u:1110: na cānaikāntikaḥ, abhyāsena sahitacetoguṇasphuṭapratibhāsayoḥ kāraṇakāryayoḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayoriva
T11bsa072_u:1111: pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau abhyāsasahitacetoguṇatvasya sādhanasya sphuṭapratibhāsakāraṇayogyatayā vyāptisiddheḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1114: trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sphuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1116: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati, na tvaviśeṣeṇa sarvadharmasākṣatkārī, tatastatsiddhaye sādhanāntaramabhidheyam ucyate - yatpramāṇasaṃvādi niścitārthaṃ vacanaṃ, tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa
T11bsa072_u:1117: vā tadarthasākṣatkārijñānapūrvakaṃ, yathā dahano dāhaka iti vacanam,
T11bsa072_u:1118: pramāṇasaṃvādi niścitārtha cedaṃ vacanaṃ, kṣaṇikāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti
T11bsa072_u:1128: anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate
T11bsa072_u:1138: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1139: tatastatsiddhaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam
T11bsa072_u:1149: sautrāntikānāṃ matam jñānamevedaṃ sarvaṃ nīlādyākāreṇa pratibhāsate, na bāhyo 'rthaḥ, jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt /
T11bsa072_u:1153: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate /
T11bsa072_u:1154: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate //
T11bsa072_u:1155: nanu yadi prakāśamānaṃ jñānamevadaṃ, tadāsti bāhyo 'rtha iti kutaḥ?
T11bsa072_u:1157: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante /
T11bsa072_u:1160: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum
T11bsa072_u:1162: iti, na punarasau bāhyo 'rthaḥ avayavī, guṇādayo dharmāḥ dravyāśrayiṇaḥ
T11bsa072_u:1166: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate /
T11bsa072_u:1167: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham /
T11bsa072_u:1168: ātmākāśakāladiṅmanasāṃ nirasanam tatrātmaniṣedhāyedamapi sādhanam - yatkādācitkaṃ jñānaṃ tatkādācitkakāraṇapūrvakam, yathā saudāminījñānam /
T11bsa072_u:1175: na cānaikāntikaḥ, dhūmapāvakayoriva kādācitkajñānakādācitkakāraṇayoḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptisiddheḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1189: atha kimākāśaṃ nāma kiñcidvastubhūtamasti? uta nāsti vā? nāstyevaitat /
T11bsa072_u:1190: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti /
T11bsa072_u:1191: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kva vākāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt?
T11bsa072_u:1192: [yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt
T11bsa072_u:1197: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt /
T11bsa072_u:1211: prasiddhaḥ, tasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalambho bādhaka ityuktam /
T11bsa072_u:1212: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
T11bsa072_u:1216: nanu ko 'yaṃ bhāgapratibhāso nāma? nānādigdeśāvaṣṣṭambhena sañcitaḥ paramāṇupratibhāsa eva
T11bsa072_u:1218: sthaulyam' ityuktaṃ dharmottareṇa,tatrāpyayamevārthaḥ arthasya svarūpeṇa nāsti vedanam, 'bhāktaṃ syādarthavedanam' iti vacanāt /
T11bsa072_u:1220: nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye 'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ,
T11bsa072_u:1221: sākṣādadhyakṣyagocarā vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ darśane, svasvākārasamarpaṇapravaṇāḥ sautrāntikānāṃ mate, te 'pi yogācārāṇāṃ darśane na sambhavanti /
T11bsa072_u:1224: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
T11bsa072_u:1230: yogācārasya matam athavāyaṃ vicāraḥ, yadetatpratibhāsamānaṃ tadekaṃ tāvanna yuktam,
T11bsa072_u:1234: yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ? atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ
T11bsa072_u:1238: `dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati
T11bsa072_u:1243: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1244: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ? pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo 'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate /
T11bsa072_u:1260: vijñānasyasya sākāratvanirākāratvapakṣabhedaḥ yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat?
T11bsa072_u:1270: sākāravādināṃ matam tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena
T11bsa072_u:1271: prasiddham, tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā /
T11bsa072_u:1274: nirākāravādināṃ matam anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam
T11bsa072_u:1276: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti
T11bsa072_u:1277: / mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat,
T11bsa072_u:1279: svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke /
T11bsa072_u:1280: na cāsya vicārataḥ kaścitsvabhāvo ghaṭate, eko vāneko vā, pūrvavicārāsahatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1285: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣu na vidyate' // iti //
T11bsa072_u:1287: `yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā /
T11bsa072_u:1291: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat,
T11bsa072_u:1292: yathā vyomakamalam,ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa072_u:1294: sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisphuṭatvāt /
T11bsa072_u:1295: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam, tato yattasya bahirbhāve
T11bsa072_u:1298: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vānekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ, ubhayathāpi bāhyārthapakṣabhāvi dūṣaṇamaśakyamurddhatum /
T11bsa072_u:1305: śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ //
T11bsa072_u:1309: * yādṛśaṃ pustake dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
T11bsa072_u:1310: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate //
